text:
Canva | Sydney, Australia | Visa | Relocation paid Canva is revolutionising design with 20,000 new users everyday.

https://about.canva.com/careers/

https://about.canva.com/careers/java-engineer/

Looking for Java Engineers: - Java expert - Strong academic background - Excellent grasp of software engineering fundamentals - Excellent English communication skills, written and spoken

Position is fulltime in Sydney. Come be part of Australia's next Unicorn.

Email resumes to jobs@canva.com. Please state that you saw the add on Hacker News.
